bad_file: Wrong file format, only *.md files are supported
md_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated content of an *.md file
md_flag_s: Style to use for ouputing fomated MD file. Available options are: dark|ascii|light|notty|dracula
info_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated message, preceeded by blue dot symbol
success_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated message, preceeded by green check sign symbol
error_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated message, with title "ERROR" followed by error message
star_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated message, preceeded by star sign symbol
warn_usage_out: Outputs in terminal formated message, with title "WARN" followed by warning message
learn_more_text: Use 'log <command> --help' for more information about a command.
